findings.title: A floating pragma is set.
findings.description: The solidity version is not specified or is too broad, which can lead to unexpected behavior and security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Call with hardcoded gas amount.
findings.description: This is discouraged as the gas cost of EVM instructions may change in the future, which could break this contract's assumptions.

findings.title: Message call with hardcoded gas amount
findings.description: This is discouraged as the gas cost of EVM instructions may change in the future, which could break this contract's assumptions.

findings.title: Presence of unused variables
findings.description: Unused variables are present in the smart contract which can lead to unnecessary storage and potential security risks.

findings.title: Right-To-Left- Override control character (U+202E)
findings.description: The Right-To-Left-Override control character (U+202E) is used which can lead to text being displayed in an unintended way, potentially causing confusion or security issues.

findings.title: Arbitrary Jump with Function Type Variable
Requirement Violation
findings.description: Improper Following of Specification by Caller

findings.title: Lack of Proper Signature Verification
findings.description: Improper verification of cryptographic signature may lead to signature replay attacks.
